trans-unit.source: Provides data for a cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per un evento annullabile.

trans-unit.source: A cancelable event is raised when a component is about to perform an action that can be canceled, such as logging on to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: Quando un componente sta per eseguire un'azione che può essere annullata, ad esempio la registrazione a un sito Web, viene generato un evento annullabile.

trans-unit.source: The LoginCancelEventArgs class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to indicate whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: La classe LoginCancelEventArgs fornisce il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà per indicare se l'evento deve essere annullata.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: A LoginCancelEventArgs object is used with controls that have cancelable actions, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto LoginCancelEventArgs viene utilizzato con i controlli contenenti operazioni annullabili, ad esempio il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>(controllo), il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>(controllo) e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"></xref> class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"> </xref> classe con il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>proprietà impostata su <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"></xref> class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"> </xref> classe con il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>impostata sul valore specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per annullare l'evento. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'evento deve essere annullata.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Cancel property to indicate whether an event, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoggingOut> event, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event, should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la proprietà Cancel per indicare se un evento, ad esempio il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>evento, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoggingOut>evento, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>evento deve essere annullato,.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoggingOut> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event should be canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'evento deve essere annullato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
